name: Bountiful Blessings (prototype)
description:
In this prototype you are an angel sent down to earth to give the begging women of earth the blessing of pregnancy, try not to get overwhelmed as you give out blessings to those in need and keep and eye on your holy ammo. 

I wanted to explore the concept of a pregnancy fetish based fps as they didn't seem to exist in the community, I made this prototype over the course of a month in order to explore the concept, I hope you folks enjoy :)

Controls:

WASD - movement

Right & Left arrow keys - look left or right.

Space - Shoot

E - interact with doors.
